Description.Text: Just 15 minutes' walk from Reading's centre, this stylish hotel offers modern rooms with private bathrooms. Guests can enjoy free WI-Fi and full English breakfasts. Rooms at Thameside Hotel are bright and airy with TVs, tea/coffee facilities, and hairdryers on request. Private in-room bathrooms also contain showers. Apartments feature HD TVs, kitchenettes, and George Foreman grills. The hotel offers 24-hour service in its Cafe Lounge, while continental or 3-course full English breakfasts can be taken in the dining room. The restaurant provide a wide range of seasonal dishes, while the bar area includes internet terminals and a big-screen TV. Free parking is available, and Reading Rail Station is just a 10-minute walk away. The Oracle Shopping Centre and the Broad Street Mall are just 15 minutes' walk away, while Reading Festival's site is just a 5-minute walk away.

Free parking is available, and Reading Rail Station is just a 10-minute walk away. The Oracle Shopping Centre and the Broad Street Mall are just 15 minutes' walk away, while Reading Festival's site is just a 5-minute walk away.

Residential apartment - Residential apartment offers one double size bed with basic amenities. Apartment.
Twin Room - Twin Room offers two twin beds with basic amenities.Twin room.
